timeline.bodyText: Please add a note that by default, the check does nothing. Thus, there is no default configuration.
timeline.author: pbludov
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -73,18 +73,39 @@ * </module> * *

- * To configure the check to print warnings if an "@incomplete" tag is found, - * and not print anything if it is not found: + * Example:

timeline.bodyText:
This check will report a violation, if an empty incomplete tag is found.
* Violation - no link provided
* @incomplete
* Ok, tag with link to the issue
* @incomplete https://example.com/tracker/issue-1234
timeline.author: pbludov
timeline.diffHunk:

+ * * Invalid

+ *

+ * To configure the check to print warnings if an "@incomplete" tag is found:

timeline.bodyText:
please update to OK, the check does nothing by default.
same for Invalid.

timeline.bodyText:
Just write here: "If no properties are specified, the check does nothing."
There is no need for either the default configuration nor the example.
